Interface FrequencyTable


  • public interface FrequencyTable
    The interface FrequencyTable. A frequency table associates counts to keys. To be more precise, the interface should be called CountTable since it stores the counts, not the frequencies. Oh well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long get(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the frequency value associated with this key.
      void init(java.lang.String key)
      Creates an entry in the frequency table and initializes its count to zero.
      LinkedList<java.lang.String> keys()
      Returns the list of keys in order, according to the method compareTo of the key objects.
      int size()
      The size of the frequency table.
      void update(java.lang.String key)
      The method updates the frequency associed with the key by one.
      long[] values()
      Returns an array containing the frequencies of the keys in the order specified by the method compareTo of the key objects.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        long get(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the frequency value associated with this key.
        Parameters:
        key - key whose frequency value is to be returned
        Returns:
        the frequency associated with this key

      • init

        void init(java.lang.String key)
        Creates an entry in the frequency table and initializes its count to zero.
        Parameters:
        key - key with which the specified value is to be associated

      • update

        void update(java.lang.String key)
        The method updates the frequency associed with the key by one.
        Parameters:
        key - key with which the specified value is to be associated

      • keys

        LinkedList<java.lang.String> keys()
        Returns the list of keys in order, according to the method compareTo of the key objects.
        Returns:
        the list of keys in order

      • values

        long[] values()
        Returns an array containing the frequencies of the keys in the order specified by the method compareTo of the key objects.
        Returns:
        an array of frequency counts

      • size

        int size()
        The size of the frequency table.
        Returns:
        the size of the frequency table
